values: （尤指乐音的）音高；音调高低；场地；运动场；投球；球场；倾斜度；坡度；强度；（感情、活动等的）程度；力度；推销用语；销售术语；摊位；销售摊位；表演场所；（体育比赛的）场地；前后颠簸；螺距；节距；沥青；柏油；
投；定调；搭建（帐篷）；设立；安顿；投标；提出（建议）；倾斜；摇晃；振动；用石头铺设；涂抹沥青；推销；宣传；猛烈攻击；陷入；沉浸；（使球）定点落地；击出大曲线球

synonym.mean: 投；掷；定位于；用沥青涂；扎营；向前倾跌
沥青；音高；程度；树脂；倾斜；投掷

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 使倾斜；扎营；投掷（pitch的过去分词）
使倾斜（pitch的ing形式）；投掷；用沥青涂；为…定调

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指用力投掷，或因感情激动而粗暴地或漫无目的地扔东西。
普通用词，使用广泛，仅指用力抛掷，不涉及动作方式或感情色彩。
常可与throw互换，指迅速扔出一个重量较轻的物体。
指无什么目的地、轻轻地、随意地掷或扔，所扔掷的东西一般都比较轻。
通常指用力投掷，动作迅猛，所投掷的距离也较远。
指随意地、轻轻地掷或扔，侧重方向性和有明确的目标。

word_group.brief_definition: 销售推介；销售说辞；销售宣传
干工作；着手处理；猛烈攻击
国际音高；音乐会音高；标准音高；最佳状态

bilingual.source: You can adjust the capo to find the perfect pitch.
bilingual.target: 你可以调整变调夹来找到完美的音高。

bilingual.source: Musicians often modulate the pitch to create different effects.
bilingual.target: 音乐家经常调节音高以创造不同的效果。

bilingual.source: In music notation, symbols indicate the pitch, rhythm, and dynamics.
bilingual.target: 在音乐记谱中，符号表示音高、节奏和力度。

bilingual.source: The music teacher introduced solfeggio to help students understand pitch.
bilingual.target: 音乐老师引入了视唱练耳来帮助学生理解音高。

bilingual.source: The lfo is used to modulate the pitch of the synthesizer.
bilingual.target: 低频振荡器用于调制合成器的音高。

bilingual.source: The pitch of the violin was slightly off during the performance.
bilingual.target: 小提琴在演奏时的音高有些偏差。

bilingual.source: The singer adjusted the pitch of her voice to hit the high note.
bilingual.target: 歌手调整了她声音的音高以达到高音。

bilingual.source: He has perfect pitch and can identify any note by ear.
bilingual.target: 他有完美的音高，可以通过耳朵识别任何音符。

bilingual.source: The pitch of the alarm was so high that it hurt my ears.
bilingual.target: 警报的音高如此之高，以至于刺痛了我的耳朵。

bilingual.source: The flute player adjusted the ventage to change the pitch of the note.
bilingual.target: 长笛演奏者调整了小孔以改变音符的音高。

yingyinNormal.en: And here's the wind-up and the pitch!
yingyinNormal.zh: 挥球转体，投吧。

yingyinNormal.en: So, today's first pitch will be delivered to home plate by science.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以今天的第一球将由科学直送本垒。

yingyinNormal.en: I suppose that field below Peckham wood could be made into a pitch.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩卡姆林下面那块地也可以改造成球场吧。

yingyinNormal.en: So, honey, are we all set for our pitch with George Ross this afternoon?
yingyinNormal.zh: 亲爱的，我们可以去跟乔治·罗斯聊了吗，就在今天下午？

yingyinNormal.en: We can pitch in. Well, whatever you could spare would certainly be welcome.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们能出点。不管你们能拿出多少我们当然都欢迎。

yingyinNormal.en: This pitch has been prepared over years with a great deal of work for the cricket.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但球场多年来花费大量人力为板球赛做准备，进行维护。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I appreciate you wanting to pitch in, but I really don't think that's necessary.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很感谢你愿意出力，但我真的认为没这必要。

yingyinNormal.en: The future of my pants hinges on the video pitch. The tone needs to be sad and pathetic.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我未来的裤子就指望这条视频了，我要用很可怜很可悲的语气。

yingyinNormal.en: You get Ramsey, you get the God's Eye. You get Shaw. Well that's the windup and the pitch.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只要找到拉姆齐，你就能得到天眼，也就能找到肖了，一切就是这么水到渠成。

yingyinNormal.en: When I was asked to throw the first pitch, a little voice in my head said I couldn't do it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当我被邀请来开球时，我脑袋里有个小声音说 "你不行"。

yingyinNormal.en: Can I have your attention, everyone? That's, B-flat, for those who don't have perfect pitch.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大家请注意，给没有绝对音感的人，这是降B调。

yingyinNormal.en: That's exactly what I want you to do with my story. No sales pitch, just your honest curiosity.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我也要你这么对待我的故事，不要粉饰，讲一下你的好奇就好。

yingyinNormal.en: First we pitch them Disney, AT&T, IBM, blue chip stocks exclusively. Companies these people know.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们先推销给他们迪斯尼，AT&T，IBM只卖蓝筹股，那些耳熟能详的公司。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, or you could pitch in, grab a nostril and help me get this face off. Come on, you can do this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 或者你可以帮个忙，抓我的鼻孔帮我把这玩意撕下来。加油啊，你行的。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, Mike. Listen, NASA asked me to throw out the first pitch at an Angels game. You got any advice?
yingyinNormal.zh: 麦克，你好，航天总局邀请我为天使队开球，你能给我点建议吗？

yingyinNormal.en: This is fun, huh? We get to see our friend throw out the first pitch, have a hot dog, watch the game.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这真有意思对吗？来看咱们朋友投出开场球，吃个热狗，看看比赛。

yingyinNormal.en: We'd have to re-site the pitch, My Lord. Of course it would take work but we've got until the summer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 板球场得另选地点了，老爷，这当然要花费些精力，但夏天之前都还来得及。

yingyinNormal.en: We're moving in a couple of days, and we got a lot of packing to do. It'd be great if you guys could pitch in.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们马上就要搬家了，有很多东西需要收拾。如果你们能来帮忙就太好了。

yingyinNormal.en: How long has INGEN been practicing this pitch? Since the day we hired you out of the Navy. You knew the end game.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你觉得国际基因科技公司在这个领域研究多久了？自从我们把你从海军挖过来之后，你知道结果会是什么样子。

yingyinNormal.en: You don't have three-wheel brakes, so you got to pitch it hard, break it loose and then just drive it with the throttle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在泥地里煞车没用，你不能踩煞车，你得用油门来控制，过弯时记得放油门

exam_freq_info.chinese: 推销行话; 推销用语

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a form of words used when trying to persuade someone to buy or accept something
sense_info_list.zh: 推销行话; 推销用语

sense_info_list.en: to try to persuade sb to buy something, to give you something or to make a business deal with you
an area of ground marked out or used for play in an outdoor team game
a black sticky substance made from oil or coal, used on roofs or the wooden boards of a ship to stop water from coming through
the degree or strength of a feeling or activity
to set up a tent or a camp for a short time

word_usage.usage: pitch作名词，表示“（事物的）最高点；音高；宣传论点”时，常用单数形式，如：reach a pitch
pitch作动词时，既可作及物动词，又可作不及物动词。作及物动词时，其后可接名词或者代词，如：pitch the ball，；也可用于被动结构

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: From the West Indies also come oil, mineral <highlight>pitch</highlight> and many forest products.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 西印度群岛地区还生产石油、柏油和许多林产品。

由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

examination_example.sentence: It's possible to drive in a matter of minutes from sleek (光亮的) office towers near the airport where people <highlight>pitch</highlight> ideas to investors, to single-family with orange trees in their yards, or to a Vietnamese mall.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们可以在机场附近时尚光亮的写字楼里向投资者推销创意，也可以在几分钟内驱车前往院子里种着橘子树的独户住宅，或者到一个越南购物中心。

examination_example.sentence: It's possible to drive in a matter of minutes from sleek office towers near the airport where people <highlight>pitch</highlight> ideas to investors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在机场附近人们向投资者宣传道：从光亮的豪华办公大楼开车过来，只需几分钟的时间。

sense_info_list.zh: 推销行话; 推销用语

examination_example.sentence: For them, the right kind of gamification might be turning their sales <highlight>pitches</highlight> into a competition with other team members.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对他们(销售人员)来说，合理的游戏化可能会将他们的推销话术转化为与团队其他成员之间的竞争。

examination_example.sentence: He spends all his spare time on the football <highlight>pitch</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他把所有的业余时间都花在足球场上。

examination_example.sentence: Do you think it's possible that this family just wants you to <highlight>pitch</highlight> in a little, to be a good guest?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你觉得有没有可能这家人只是想让你出点力，做个好客人？
